item.title: DeFi breaks $1 Billion Total Value Locked (TVL)
item.dc:creator: Chaz Schmidt
item.description:
It’s official! Decentralized Finance (DeFi) has reached a new milestone surpassing $1,000,000,000 Total Value Locked (TVL). Thank you to the...

The post DeFi breaks $1 Billion Total Value Locked (TVL) appeared first on Defi Pulse test.
item.content:encoded:
It’s official! Decentralized Finance (DeFi) has reached a new milestone surpassing $1,000,000,000 Total Value Locked (TVL).

Thank you to the community for every like, share, retweet, mention, citation, and refresh! $1 Billion marks an important milestone for DeFi to be celebrated. It illustrates the progress we’ve made towards our community’s vision of decentralized finance and the future of the world at large.

Additionally, $1B feels like an early birthday present for DeFi Pulse which was launched in February 2019. Come celebrate with us in our Telegram or Discord!

The post DeFi breaks $1 Billion Total Value Locked (TVL) appeared first on Defi Pulse test.
